m_szDocSumamry: US Electric Car Sales Have Increased 361% In 2013 So Far Originally published on EV Obsession . I would say that the strong growth of 100% electric car and plug-in hybrid electric car US sales is really no longer a story — they’ve been growing strongly month after month without a break. However, the odd thing is that there’s still all kinds of anti-hype. There are a lot of people in the media, especially “Big Media,” who are repeating the whole “electric vehicle sales are disappointing” meme. This is a case of two things, in my opinion. 1) This is largely a case of expectations being too high.
